title: Buoyant force - height of raft beneath water

content.question: A raft of density <math alttext="0.7 rho sub lowercase w" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.7</mn><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub></math> floats partially submerged in a body of water of density <math alttext="rho sub lowercase w" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub></math>. The raft has dimensions of length <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math>, width <math alttext="uppercase W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>W</mi></math>, and height <math alttext="uppercase H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>H</mi></math>, as shown in the figure. The height of the raft beneath the surface of the water is <math alttext="lowercase h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math>. Which of the following expressions is equal to <math alttext="lowercase h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="0.7 L uppercase W uppercase H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.7</mn><mi>L</mi><mi>W</mi><mi>H</mi></math>
<math alttext="0.7 rho sub lowercase w, end sub, L uppercase W uppercase H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.7</mn><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub><mi>L</mi><mi>W</mi><mi>H</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
